key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities, including semiconductor shortages and operational delays
Cybersecurity and data breaches, including a 2024 incident affecting millions of customers
Competitive pressures from rivals like HP, Lenovo, Apple, AWS, and Microsoft Azure
High debt levels and financial stability concerns, despite the VMware spin-off
controversies: Allegations of illegal e-waste exports and unethical treatment practices
Lawsuits related to the 2024 data breach and failure to protect customer data
environmental_issues: E-waste management controversies and scrutiny over sustainability practices
social_issues: Customer data privacy concerns due to cybersecurity breaches
governance_issues: Potential governance challenges in managing supply chain risks and cybersecurity vulnerabilities
